pisces.d

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • pisces.d.FPMath
      • pisces.d.FXMath
        • pisces.d.LineSink
          • pisces.d.RendererBase
            • pisces.d.Renderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Constants

    public final class Renderer
extends RendererBase
    The backend blender is Blit. This front end to the blender computes an alpha plane (from Renderer field rowAA to Blit argument alphaData) between a sink (source) and a surface (target) for subpixel blending (antialiasing).
    See Also:
    Pisces, Blit
